## 1
```{r}
#1
tpm <- matrix(c(1/3, 1/3, 1/3,0, 0, 1/3, 1/3, 1/3, 1/3,1/3,1/3,0,1/3,1/3,1/3,0), byrow = T, nrow = 4)
tpm
y <- diag(4)
z <- t(y -tpm)
z
z[4,] = c(1,1,1,1)
a <- solve(z)
a[,4]
```
